function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential overcrowding in public venues and transport","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to avoid overcrowding, such as social distancing and crowd control","Technologies":"Digital monitoring systems, crowd management software","People":"Urban dwellers, commuters, visitors to public venues","Owner":"City authorities, public transport operators, venue owners"},{"Description":"Misinformation and job precarity leading to challenges","Impact":"Greater vulnerability to the spread of contagious diseases due to lack of accurate information and unstable employment conditions","Mitigation":"Promoting reliable information sources, providing job security, and access to healthcare","Technologies":"Social media fact-checking tools, digital medical records and telehealth services","People":"Workers, communities, individuals accessing information online","Owner":"Employers, government, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Inadequate city infrastructure and design for disease management","Impact":"Inefficient response to contagious diseases and increased risk of spread","Mitigation":"Retrofitting public venues and transport, redesigning city layout to prevent overcrowding","Technologies":"Smart city solutions, digital monitoring systems, urban planning software","People":"Urban dwellers, visitors to public venues","Owner":"City authorities, urban planners, infrastructure developers"}]}
